words.source: H5065 conj. + def. art. + Qal ptc. mp of נָגַשׂ 'to press, drive, oppress'; KJV 'the taskmasters', ESV 'the taskmasters', NASB 'the taskmasters'
H213 Qal ptc. mp of אוּץ 'to press, urge, hasten'; KJV 'hasted', ESV 'were urgent', NASB 'pressed'
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H3615 Piel imv. 2mp of כָּלָה 'to complete, finish'; KJV 'fulfil', ESV 'complete', NASB 'complete'
H4639 n.mp constr. + 2mp suff. of מַעֲשֶׂה 'work, deed'; KJV 'your works', ESV 'your work', NASB 'your work'
H1697 n.ms constr. of דָּבָר 'word, matter, thing'; KJV 'daily tasks', ESV 'daily task', NASB 'daily amount'
H3117 n.ms of יוֹם 'day'; part of idiom 'day by day' = daily quota
H3117 prep. b- + n.ms + 3ms suff. of יוֹם 'day'; KJV 'in his day', ESV 'on its day', NASB 'each day'
H834 prep. k- + rel. pron. אֲשֶׁר 'as, just as'; KJV 'as when', ESV 'as when', NASB 'when'
H1961 prep. b- + Qal inf. constr. of הָיָה 'to be'; temporal clause 'when there was'
H8401 def. art. + n.ms תֶּבֶן 'straw'; KJV 'straw', ESV 'straw', NASB 'straw'
